search.name: JDK Javadoc Search
search.description:
Search Sun's JDK Javadoc. Uses Google.
Switches:
/1.4 - Version 1.4 JDK (default)
/1.3 - Version 1.3 JDK
/tutorial - Java language tutorial
/j2ee - J2EE documentation
/jls - Java language specification
/jvm - Java VM specification
/all - Search all of java.sun.com
Example:
jdk HashMap /1.3
jdk catch /tutorial
